name: Jack Keane

files.install: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Jack Keane/bin/release/JackKeane.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
